column1: '''Rochon Methestel''' or '''Rider of the Last Hope''' is a song about [[Borondir|Borondir Udalraph]]
column2: who was sent out to seek the aid of the [[Éothéod]] by his Steward
column3: [[Cirion]]. He came back with the troops of [[Eorl]]
column4: but did not survive the [[Battle of the Field of Celebrant]].<ref>{{HM|UT}}
